attributes.action: Encourage patriotism and make people aware of our heritage, traditions and achievements that make us proud to be British.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In Great Britain today, people do not understand our heritage and do not celebrate Great Britains traditons and achievements.
More cultural events should be held and young and old shoud be made more aware of their heritage, the achievements of Great Britons, British traditons and the sacrifice of our armed personnel past and present to ensure we have the freedoms we take for granted today.
We should be proud to fly the Union Flag and should be proud to be British!
